title: lost account
body:
I lost account, password and email has changed i already request a ticket, but riot customer support reply me three times same answers

 "I have investigated using the information that you have provided and unfortunately, I am unable to verify the account with the current information. As a result, I am unable to provide you with access to the account.

I am sorry for the frustration but I will be unable to continue based on the information provided. Please let me know if you have any further concerns or questions but in regard to this issue, please consider this matter closed unless you have more information about the start of the account."

 I don't believe you have investigated. Because this account is mine and I have proved everything I have remember and riot games support don't believe me. I can't get my own account back, that's funny.This is your dereliction of dutyï¼ŒYou don't know that account how important to me. I'm really angry and disappoint right now.

replies.body: Reaching out to support through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) was the best option, as our account team are best fit to help you with this.  Continue communicating with them, as they are the only ones who are able to help with recovering the account.  It's super important that account ownership is verified to make sure that it's not be recovered to an unauthorized user.  Good luck!
